publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3022 Roseanna Cunningham:Dunning Summit—That the Parliament welcomes the Dunning summit which will be held from 28 to 30 June 2005 in Dunning, Perthshire; notes that 22 delegates will be attending from nine African countries; commends the people of Dunning for organising this event; awaits with anticipation the final communiqu é from the event, which will be delivered to the G8 by bike by the local police officer, and urges the delegates to the G8 summit to give consideration to the outcome of this excellent example of positive engagement between the people of Strathearn and the issues involved in the G8 summit. Supported by: Eleanor Scott*, Brian Adam*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Fiona Hyslop*, Bruce Crawford*, Karen Gillon*, Jim Mather*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Rob Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*, Patrick Harvie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Phil Gallie*, Alex Neil*, Shiona Baird* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-3022 Roseanna Cunningham: Dunning Summit—That the Parliament welcomes the Dunning summit which will be held from 28 to 30 June 2005 in Dunning, Perthshire; notes that 22 delegates will be attending from nine African countries; commends the people of Dunning for organising this event; awaits with anticipation the final communiqu é from the event, which will be delivered to the G8 by bike by the local police officer, and urges the delegates to the G8 summit to give consideration to the outcome of this excellent example of positive engagement between the people of Strathearn and the issues involved in the G8 summit. Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Brian Adam, Mr John Swinney, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Mark Ruskell, Fiona Hyslop, Bruce Crawford, Karen Gillon, Jim Mather, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Rob Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Patrick Harvie, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Chris Ballance, Robin Harper, Phil Gallie, Alex Neil, Shiona Baird
S2M-3022 Dunning Summit (lodged on 23 June 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3022 Dunning Summit (lodged on 23 June 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-3022 Dunning Summit (lodged on 23 June 2005) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-3022 Dunning Summit (lodged on 23 June 2005) Mark Ballard*
